name: Dungeon Warfare (itch) (Bromelee)
description:
Here comes this new game, trying this time the medieval and RPG.

This game was created for the GOEDWAREGAMEJAM

the theme this time was ENHANCE and with that i think like in the RPG games where you can level up your stats, but this time.

Here you will have totally control and create your own stats cause you can level them individually. So your character will and game will be totally differents.

Hope you all enjoy it x3
